main.name: Javier Fong
main.jobDescription: help the company in digital transformation. I discovered my interest in coding and now I am passionate and excited to use my web development skills to enhance daily life through technologies by creating software applications.
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit and a passion for coding. Working in a role that has numerous contacts with technologies, I started developing an interest in coding and pursued my first software engineering course with General Assembly. I am constantly learning and my aspiration is to become a full stack developer.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I am always interested in learning new technologies and these are the ones that have won me over

education.school: Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology University, SIM-RMIT
education.degree: Bachelor of Business in Economics & Finance

work.title: Engineer (Tech & Transformation)
work.description:
Fongâ€™s Engineering & Manufacturing Private Limited is a leading precision engineering company engaged in the design, manufacture and repair of products primarily for the medical industry. 

For most of my time here, I have assisted the manager to plan & execute projects under its purview, and in joint efforts with both colleagues and external technology experts, to ascertain the best solutions to meet company's digitalisation strategy.

work.title: Financial Analyst (Informatics)
work.description:
Changi General Hospital (CGH) is an award-winning public hospital with over 1,000 beds caring for a community of more than 1 million people in the East. CGH offers a comprehensive range of medical specialties and services, helmed by a highly experienced and skilled team of healthcare professionals who consistently deliver excellent health outcomes and care for patients. 

For most of my time here, I have planned, managed and coordinated IT-related projects in view of relevant financial policies and operational requirements. I have liaised with relevant stakeholders in business process re-engineering, finalizing user requirements and performing user acceptance tests. I am responsible for maintenance of pricing and costing systems as well as participated in financial and management accounting.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in my group project.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I have used React as my frontend library in my projects.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice.

skills.name: Express JS
skills.description: I have used Express JS as my preferred web application framework for all my projects so far.

skills.name: Bootstrap 4
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is a framework I am familiar with and therefore able to design faster.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I am better educated with the use of NoSQL database and the ease of use of MongoDB suits my needs making it much more enjoyable to work with.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

skills.name: Material-UI
skills.description: I have used Material-UI components to build a React UI framework in my latest project, allowing for faster and easier stylized web development.

projects.title: Word Unscramble
projects.category: A word unscramble game that could serve as an educational purpose, and users could learn new english words they have never heard about.

projects.title: Vacay Diary
projects.category: An app to plan and manage holiday itineraries.

projects.title: Playboy Starter Pack
projects.category: A group project that aims to provide users to quickly find memes/gifs/puns to impress their female counterpart.

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Tim on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Tim excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Alastair Beaumont - Web Developer at AppColony
